text: "The Lady of Shalott" is a poem by the English poet Alfred, Lord Tennyson (1809–1892). Like his other early poems – "Sir Lancelot and Queen Guinevere" and "Galahad" – the poem is about Arthurian subject matter loosely based on medieval sources. Category:19th-century British poems Category:Works based on the Arthurian legend Category:1830s poems Category:1840s poems
title: The Lady of Shalott
